lead_paragraph: Tennessee Titans receiver Brandon Jones faces a misdemeanor charge of unlawful possession of a handgun after trying to carry the weapon in his bag through a security checkpoint at Nashville International Airport. Jones said in a statement he had a license for the gun along with a permit allowing him to carry it.
